name: app-who-metadata

scripts.build: webpack --config webpack.prod.config.js && mkdirp build/ && cp src/index.html build/ && cp src/manifest.webapp build/ && mkdirp build/img/icons/ && cp -r src/img/icons/ build/icons/ && cp -r src/i18n/ build/i18n/ && mkdirp build/data/ && cp src/data/whoData.json build/data/ && cp src/runtimeConfig.json build/
scripts.postbuild: mkdirp buildzip/ && pushd build && bestzip ../buildzip/WHOBrowser.zip * && popd
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test mocha --reporter spec --compilers js:babel-core/register --require config/setup.js --recursive test
scripts.test-watch: NODE_ENV=test mocha --reporter spec --compilers js:babel-core/register --require config/setup.js --recursive test --watch

author: Joakim Melseth (cloned from dhis2_app-skeleton https://github.com/dhis2/app-skeleton by Mark Polak)
